data.name: Core Power Enhancement III
data.description: Increase the maximum AP by 1500 by strengthening core power.

data.name: Condenser Reinforcement II
data.description: Strengthen the condenser to increase the total amount of power that can be stored. Booster maximum charge increases by 20%.

data.name: Reactor Efficiency II
data.description: Increase the efficiency of the reactor; increase the dash output by 20%.

data.name: High Energy Rail
data.description: Enables rail output to the gun row, allowing bullets to penetrate one enemy.

data.name: Firepower Reconstruction III
data.description: Reconfigures the firepower of the weapon you use. Increases damage to all weapons by 20%.

data.name: Enhanced Radar III
data.description: Strengthen radar. Rock-on distance increases by 30%.

data.name: Reserve Barrel Rotation II
data.description: Increase the attack speed of the reserve armament by 20%.

data.name: Reserve Aim Accuracy II
data.description: Increase aiming accuracy by learning the aiming system. The firing error rate of the reserve armament is reduced by 20%.

data.name: Reserve Ammunition Capacity II
data.description: The ammunition of the reserve armament increases by 40%.

data.name: Enable Resupply
data.description: It can be loaded with shoulder arms.

data.name: Heavy Armored Plate II
data.description: Equipped with heavy protective plate, it improves defense by 10%.

data.name: Protective Magnetic Field II
data.description: Enable the protective magnetic field to ignore damage with a 10% chance of shooting.
